mapper.select: select (orderUserId)userId from portfolio.order group by orderUserId;
mapper.update: update portfolio.user set userPoint = (userPoint+(select sum(goodsPoint) from portfolio.orderlist join portfolio.option on orderList_optionNum = optionNum join goods on option_goodsNum = goodsNum join portfolio.order on orderList_orderNum = orderNum where orderUserId = #{user.userId} and orderDate>=(CURDATE()-INTERVAL 15 DAY))) where userId = #{user.userId}
